books.author: by Rick Wilson
books.description: The Republican political campaign strategist gives his take on the current president and offers a way forward for conservatives.
books.name: EVERYTHING TRUMP TOUCHES DIES

books.author: by Gregg Jarrett
books.description: The Fox News analyst makes his case against the F.B.I. investigation into collusion between the Trump campaign and Russia.
books.name: THE RUSSIA HOAX

books.author: by Tara Westover
books.description: The daughter of survivalists, who is kept out of school, educates herself enough to leave home for university.
books.name: EDUCATED

books.author: by Jeanine Pirro
books.description: The legal analyst and Fox News host argues in favor of President Trump.
books.name: LIARS, LEAKERS AND LIBERALS

books.author: by Beth Macy
books.description: An in-depth look at how opioid addiction affects Americans across geographic and class lines.
books.name: DOPESICK

books.author: by Dinesh D'Souza
books.description: A companion text to the conservative author and filmmaker’s documentary, which offers an alternative history of the Democratic Party.
books.name: DEATH OF A NATION

books.author: by Yuval Noah Harari
books.description: How Homo sapiens became Earth’s dominant species.
books.name: SAPIENS

books.author: by Ron Stallworth
books.description: The first black detective of the Colorado Springs Police Department goes undercover to investigate the Ku Klux Klan.
books.name: BLACK KLANSMAN

books.author: by John Carreyrou
books.description: The rise and fall of Theranos, the biotech startup that failed to deliver on its promise to make blood testing more efficient.
books.name: BAD BLOOD

books.author: by Lynn Vincent and Sara Vladic
books.description: A newly researched look into the sinking of the U.S.S. Indianapolis, the story of the survivors and the fight to exonerate the court-martialed skipper.
books.name: INDIANAPOLIS

books.author: by Anthony Bourdain
books.description: A memoir-exposé of the restaurant world. Originally published in 2000.
books.name: KITCHEN CONFIDENTIAL

books.author: by David Sedaris
books.description: A collection of comedic stories on mortality, middle age and a beach house dubbed the Sea Section.
books.name: CALYPSO

books.author: by David Grann
books.description: The story of a murder spree in 1920s Oklahoma that targeted Osage Indians, whose lands contained oil.
books.name: KILLERS OF THE FLOWER MOON

books.author: by Craig Brown
books.description: A kaleidoscopic biography of the enigmatic younger sister of Queen Elizabeth II, derived from a broad range of source materials.
books.name: NINETY-NINE GLIMPSES OF PRINCESS MARGARET

books.author: by Jon Meacham
books.description: The present political climate is contextualized through the lens of difficult moments in American history.
books.name: THE SOUL OF AMERICA
